title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured online store with product management, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative project management tool with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

title: AI Chat Application
description: An intelligent chatbot interface powered by OpenAI API with conversation history, multiple chat rooms, and markdown support.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A beautiful weather application with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and hourly/weekly predictions.

title: Portfolio Website
description: This very website you're viewing! A modern, responsive portfolio built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

title: Blog Platform
description: A full-stack blogging platform with MDX support, authentication, comments, and SEO optimization.
